abstract: Also, The Guardian and a conservative commentator part ways, and two member of Pussy Riot are said to have fled Russia.
snippet: Also, The Guardian and a conservative commentator part ways, and two member of Pussy Riot are said to have fled Russia.
lead_paragraph: Tropical Storm Isaac is now projected to veer away from the Republican National Convention in Tampa, Fla., and toward New Orleans, but it still promises to take the spotlight away from the convention to nominate Mitt Romney. If Isaac hits the Gulf Coast states it could become a breaking news event that pulls attention away from the convention. Under one unpleasant scenario, Jim Rutenberg and Michael D. Shear write, the networks could go to a split-screen, pairing

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Isaac Crashes G.O.P. Convention, and Whither ‘Nightline’?
